title: 'Suge' Knight Charged With Murder After Fatal Hit-And-Run
teaser: The former rap music mogul, Marion "Suge" Knight has been arrested again â€” this time, on suspicion of murder. Knight allegedly ran over two people, killing one, on the set of the movie Straight Outta Compton.
